## SymOpts.q property

If in global scope, used for:

- `in` =<!-- -->&gt; attribute (in VS), varying (in FS) - `out` =<!-- -->&gt; varying (in VS), output (in FS)

For parameters / fn args:

- `in` =<!-- -->&gt; passed into a function - `out` =<!-- -->&gt; passed back out of a function, but not initialized - `inout` =<!-- -->&gt; passed both into and out of a function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
q?: SymQualifier;
```
